# [Interview #46: Twitter: AMOL Writing and Editing Process, Entry #30](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=46#30)

#### [Austin Moore (5 September 2011)](http://twitter.com/#!/Southpaw2014/status/110837446228455424)

Is
*A Memory of Light*
still on par to being around the length of
*Towers of Midnight*
?

#### [Brandon Sanderson (5 September 2011)](http://twitter.com/#!/BrandSanderson/status/110844153054756864)

Yes.
